spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement is mostly correct, but wall alignment has minor deviations. Door and window placements have significant errors across multiple rooms. Room proportions are generally preserved but some areas show distortion.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent in several areas, particularly where walls meet. Door embedding is frequently incorrect, with doors not fully integrated into walls. Adjacency relationships are mostly correct. One room is missing. No hallucinated rooms.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement accuracy is poor, with many items either missing, misplaced, or having incorrect orientations. Furniture scale consistency is also a significant issue, with many items appearing disproportionate to the rooms and other furniture.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness and orthographic projection accuracy are good. Lighting quality is decent but could be improved. Geometry cleaniness has some issues, with minor distortions observed. Visual clarity and composition are acceptable.

detected_errors.description: Missing bed in the left bedroom.
Missing wardrobe/storage unit in the left bedroom.
Missing wardrobe/storage unit in the right bedroom.
Missing shower unit in the bathroom.
Missing sink in the bathroom.
Missing dining chairs around the dining table.
Missing sofa/seating in the living room area.
Missing washing machine in the kitchen area.
Missing stove/cooktop in the kitchen area.
Missing refrigerator in the kitchen area.
Missing second window in the kitchen/dining area.
Missing storage unit near the entrance/hallway.
Door leading to the left bedroom is misplaced and has incorrect orientation.
Door leading to the bathroom is misplaced and has incorrect orientation.
Door leading to the right bedroom is misplaced and has incorrect orientation.
Window in the left bedroom is misplaced and has incorrect proportions.
Window in the kitchen/dining area is misplaced and has incorrect proportions.
Toilet in the bathroom is misplaced and incorrectly oriented relative to the wall.
Desk and chair in the right bedroom are misplaced and oriented incorrectly.
Small side table/storage in the right bedroom is misplaced.
Couch in the living room is misplaced and has incorrect scale.
Two armchairs in the living room are misplaced and have incorrect scale.
Dining table is misplaced towards the wall.
Kitchen sink is misplaced and significantly different in configuration.
Doors throughout the plan have incorrect opening orientations compared to the floor plan.
Beds in both bedrooms have incorrect orientation.
Proportion distortion of the window in the left bedroom.
Proportion distortion of the window in the kitchen/dining area.
Proportion distortion of many furniture pieces, e.g., living room set, dining table.
Hallucinated plant in the hallway near the bathroom.
Hallucinated wall segment near the entrance door.
Hallucinated small counter/cabinet next to the kitchen sink.
Minor wall alignment issues at several junctions.
